mapper.update: update tbl_activity set name=#{name}, owner=#{owner}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, editBy=#{editBy}, editTime=#{editTime}, description=#{description} where id = #{id};

mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.createBy, a.createTime, a.editBy, a.editTime, a.description from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id = #{id}

select a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id in (select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId = #{cid})

select a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in (select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId =#{cid})
